Message: Red eyes float in the darkness.

The creatures attacked us
suddenly one night.

They came at us with their
sharp claws and big fangs,

but Big Sis stood her ground
in front of me.

Something inside me exploded,
and an array of lightning bolts
crashed down.

I-I’ve never used
that kind of power before...

Huh...? Big Sis?
Big Sis, where are you?!

All I see around me
is the burnt ground.

I-I’m sure the lightning just
made her fall off the cliff.
I quickly climbed down the cliff,
but what I saw there was...
